 2024-00732024-01-30PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of JEREMIAH GROVES of Iqaluit, Nunavut, to be a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of JEREMIAH GROVES of Iqaluit, Nunavut, to be a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
